vikidm.units package¶

Submodules¶

vikidm.units.abnormal module¶

class vikidm.units.abnormal.AbnormalHandler(dm, bizunit, type_)[source]¶

An abnormal controller.

It always associate with an specific handle angent, dependent on abnormal type.

Controlling logic is simililar with ClusterAgency. When Abnormal hanppens, It will be pushed to stack, then the handler agent executed. Finally, set the abnormal unit and it’s agency parent(if any) to STATUS_ABNORMAL state. The main routine will pop STATUS_ABNORMAL unit.

Attributes:
bpointer

Return the value of _bpointer.

fpointer

Return the value of _fpointer.

identifier

Return the value of _identifier.

state
tag

Return the value of _tag.

Methods

restore_focus_after_child_done() see restore_focus_after_child_done()

ABNORMAL_ACTION_TIMEOUT = 'ABNORMAL_ACTION_TIMEOUT'¶
ABNORMAL_INPUT_TIMEOUT = 'ABNORMAL_INPUT_TIMEOUT'¶

vikidm.units.agency module¶

class vikidm.units.agency.Agency(dm, tag, data)[source]¶

Instance of Agency subclass usually represent a local logic controller.

Agency instance always have children nodes.

Attributes:
api_concept_keys : [str], Concepts update with APIs by module like

recommendation system.

children : [], Children BizUnit nodes.
trigger_child : BizUnit, child that activate it.

The child trigged the Agency instance.

Methods

get_agency(dm, tag, data) A factory method, return required instance of Agency subclass.
reset_concepts() Reset concepts of descendant nodes, intent concept and API concepts.
restore_focus_after_child_done() Become focus again afater child node finishing executing.
TYPE_CLUSTER = 'TYPE_CLUSTER'¶
TYPE_MIX = 'TYPE_MIX'¶
TYPE_ROOT = 'TYPE_ROOT'¶
TYPE_SEQUENCE = 'TYPE_SEQUENCE'¶
TYPE_TARGET = 'TYPE_TARGET'¶
children¶
entrance¶
classmethod get_agency(dm, tag, data)[source]¶

A factory method, return required instance of Agency subclass.

reset_concepts()[source]¶

Reset concepts of descendant nodes, intent concept and API concepts.

Invoked when itself and parent is not in the stack.

restore_focus_after_child_done()[source]¶

Become focus again afater child node finishing executing.

trigger_child¶

The child trigged the Agency instance.

class vikidm.units.agency.TargetAgency(dm, tag, data)[source]¶

A local controller with children of type TargetAgent and TriggerAgent.

The TargetAgent children will require user inputs to fill target concepts and the TriggerAgent give the desired response.

Attributes:
target_concepts : [Concept]

Concepts to filled by TargetAgent children.

Methods

get_agency(dm, tag, data) A factory method, return required instance of Agency subclass.
reset_concepts() Reset concepts of descendant nodes, intent concept and API concepts.
restore_focus_after_child_done() see restore_focus_after_child_done()
restore_topic_and_focus() see restore_topic_and_focus()
restore_focus_after_child_done()[source]¶

see restore_focus_after_child_done()

restore_topic_and_focus()[source]¶

see restore_topic_and_focus()

target_concepts¶

Concepts to filled by TargetAgent children.

vikidm.units.agent module¶

class vikidm.units.agent.Agent(dm, tag, data)[source]¶

Any response of DM always related to an Agent.

Attributes:
subject : str, Deprecated.
scope : str, Deprecated.
event_id : str, Correspond to an resource and event with specific

arguments.

timeout : float, Action time out.
entrance : boolean, If the agent could trigger an ancestor node of

type MixAgency.

state : The state of agent.
trigger_concepts : dict, Concepts that could trigger the agent.
target_concepts : list, Concepts that the agent will fill.

Methods

get_agent(dm, tag, data) Create and return a instance of subclass of Agent.
on_confirm() Deal with action confirm message from device.
reset_concepts() Reset concepts when parent node(an Agency) is not in the stack.
satisfied() Return if the trigger concepts is satisfied.
entrance¶
event_id¶

vikidm.units.bizunit module¶

class vikidm.units.bizunit.BizUnit(dm, identifier, tag, data)[source]¶

Base class of all business dealing unit.

Attributes:
bpointer

Return the value of _bpointer.

fpointer

Return the value of _fpointer.

identifier

Return the value of _identifier.

state
tag

Return the value of _tag.

Methods

execute() Execute the main routine of bizunit.
hierarchy_trigger() Activate and return the top ancestor node in the stack.
is_abnormal() If the unit in the ABNORMAL state.
is_completed() If the node finish executing, should pop out from stack.
restore_topic_and_focus() Invoked when the agent become focus again, and it’s not in the same hierarchy path with previous focus.
set_state(value) Set unit state.
transferable() If the node is in a trasferable state.
STATUS_ABNORMAL = 'STATUS_ABNORMAL'¶
STATUS_ACTION_COMPLETED = 'STATUS_ACTION_COMPLETED'¶
STATUS_AGENCY_COMPLETED = 'STATUS_AGENCY_COMPLETED'¶
STATUS_CANDICATE = 'STATUS_CANDICATE'¶
STATUS_DELAY_EXIST = 'STATUS_DELAY_EXIST'¶
STATUS_STACKWAIT = 'STATUS_STACKWAIT'¶
STATUS_TARGET_COMPLETED = 'STATUS_TARGET_COMPLETED'¶
STATUS_TREEWAIT = 'STATUS_TREEWAIT'¶
STATUS_TRIGGERED = 'STATUS_TRIGGERED'¶
STATUS_WAIT_ACTION_CONFIRM = 'STATUS_WAIT_ACTION_CONFIRM'¶
STATUS_WAIT_TARGET = 'STATUS_WAIT_TARGET'¶
execute()[source]¶

Execute the main routine of bizunit.

Instance of Agent will always return a vlaue. Instance of Agency will always return {}.

hierarchy_trigger()[source]¶

Activate and return the top ancestor node in the stack.

It will push trigger_child node to stack.

is_abnormal()[source]¶

If the unit in the ABNORMAL state.

is_completed()[source]¶

If the node finish executing, should pop out from stack.

restore_topic_and_focus()[source]¶

Invoked when the agent become focus again, and it’s not in the same hierarchy path with previous focus.

set_state(value)[source]¶

Set unit state.

state¶
transferable()[source]¶

If the node is in a trasferable state.

The main routine of DM will call it’s execute function if it’s in a transferable focus state.
